The Commonwealth Of Zion Assembly

Birthed over twenty two years ago in the city of Ilorin, Kwara State, Nigeria, The Commonwealth of Zion Assembly has transformed numerous lives across the nations of the world.

Partner with GOD

At COZA, we believe that we are all called to spread the gospel to the ends of the earth. Through the financial support of our partners, we have been able to spread the good news through unique methodology prompted by the kingdom requirements necessary to fulfil our vision.
